isis.stitle: FRAME - MXT - REPAIR AND REINFORCEMENT RECOMMENDED PROCEDURES - FULL LENGTH "L" WELD REPAIR REINFORCEMENTS

svcprocinfo.para: Steps 1 and 2 above also apply to the full length "L" reinforcements available from International. All of these are the inverted "L" type and are designed for installation on the outside of the sidemember section (except 9000 Series) ( Figure 11A).

svcsubproc.title: Recommended Applications
svcsubproc.para: This type of reinforcement is recommended for cases of cracking at very low mileage where a web crack has extended beyond the range for a flat plate reinforcement but ends short of the bend radius. It is also applicable to cases in which the cracking is accompanied by flange buckling.

step1.para: For custom-fabricated full length "L" reinforcements, the section should be oriented up or down so that the flange is on the same side as the damaged area.
For maximum strength the flange should be on the outside of the section.
Follow the general recommendations above for attachment of the reinforcement.
